entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
